messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] new member too...part 2
messages.msgSnippet: Welcome Chris, from another Minnesota unschooler! Kelli Chris Holm  wrote:I forgot to say that I m in Minnesota. Chris +++ The most
messages.messageBody:
Welcome Chris,
from another Minnesota unschooler!
Kelli
Chris Holm <arenzano@...> wrote:I forgot to say that I'm in Minnesota.
Chris


+++"The most important question any thinking creature can ask itself
is, "What is worth thinking about?" When we deny it's right to decide
that for itself, when we try to control what it must attend to and
think about, we make it less observant, resourceful, and adaptive,
in a word, less intelligent, in a blunter word, more stupid."

John Holt ++++



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
